title: Texas Hats
desc:
Change the police hats to Texas Sheriff hats and the fire hats to the default 911 Operator hats. Also removes hats from medic and doctor. This mod will only effect USA towns/cities and may not function correctly if installed with other mods that also change USA hats.

-- Mod by Soharic. Visit www.soharicmedia.com/112/hat-mods#texas-hats for more information.
